Has anyone been thru this before? How painful or not painful was the recovery? Anything you can tell me to make this not so unknown and scary is a help. I hate going into things blind. Posts.Content: Jul 6, 2012 10:27AM victoriah68 wrote: So finally heard back. Right breast benign inflammation. Left breast hyperplasia. The nurse said the dr would go into further details at post op visit but not cancer or pre cancer. But from what I am reading it is a form of precancer. Anyone know anything about this?
